lead_paragraph: Running back Marshall Faulk will have major reconstructive knee surgery and will miss the 2006 season, a blow that could end his career. The 33-year-old Faulk, ninth on the N.F.L’s career rushing list with 12,279 yards, had lesser surgery on both knees earlier this year. He made one start last season.
